text: E'inage higeno Hilkaia'ene kini ne'mo'ma huzmantea vahe'mo'zanena, kasnampa a' Hulda kenaku Jerusalemi kumapina, noti kaziga mago kuma me'nea kumapi vu'naze. Hagi ana a'mofo neve'a, Salumukino Tokhati nemofo Hasra negeho'e. Hagi agra kukena nonte kva ne' mani'ne. Hagi ana kini ne'mo'ma hiankea ana vahe'mo'za kasnampa ara ome asami'naze.
